description: This Java class 'TemplateService' provides CRUD operations and business logic for managing invoice templates within the system. It interacts with repositories for persistence, performs validation, and maps entities to DTO responses.

classes.name: TemplateService
classes.description: A service class providing CRUD and business logic for managing invoice templates.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new invoice template associated with a partner, initializes template properties, persists it, and returns a DTO response.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates fields of an existing template based on provided data, then returns an updated DTO.

methods.name: find
methods.description: Retrieves a template by its ID and returns its DTO representation.

methods.name: listByPartner
methods.description: Lists all templates associated with a specific partner, returning a list of DTO responses.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a template by its ID from the repository.
